entities.name: patronuses
entities.description: The Patronuses are silver creatures that glided out of the dungeon, described as 'silver stag' and 'otter'. They were able to scatter the dementors and protect Harry and the Muggleborns.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The Dementors are dark creatures that were falling back on both sides of Harry and the Patronuses, scattering before them.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an official organization that Harry advises people to get away from, as it has been decided that they should go into hiding with their families.

entities.name: muggleborns
entities.description: The Muggleborns are a group of people who were waiting outside the dungeon, described as 'dazzled by the light of the Patronuses and still cowering slightly'.

entities.name: atrium
entities.description: The Atrium is a location where Harry and the Muggleborns will be able to leave, as advised by Harry.

relationships.description: The Patronuses scattered the Dementors, protecting Harry and the Muggleborns.
Harry advises people to get away from the Ministry, as it has been decided that they should go into hiding with their families.
The Patronuses led Harry and the Muggleborns to the Atrium, where they will be able to leave.
